post.description: Handle an incoming authentication request.

This api receive `login_id` as unique user then as per configuration
 and send temporary password or reset link or One Time Pin verifcation
 to proceed

This api receive `token`, `password` & `password_confirmation` to reset
 user with given password. If otp or token didn't match throws exception
 to proceed

API let user to verify mobile, email and user account
 field value can only between **email|mobile|user**
 send verification link or otp as per configuration

get.description:
Return a listing of the user resource as collection.

 *```paginate=false``` returns all resource as list not pagination*

post.description: Create a new user resource in storage.

get.description: Return a specified user resource found by id.

put.description: Update a specified user resource using id.

delete.description: Soft delete a specified user resource using id.

post.description:
Restore the specified user resource from trash.
 ** ```Soft Delete``` needs to enabled to use this feature**

Reset user pin, password or both from admin panel
 and send an updated value to targeted user
 system will also verify which user is requesting
